title: Implement non-legacy TH/THC resize, with pseudo 0-sized dimension sup…
body_html:
…port.

Unlike resizeLegacy / resizeNdLegacy, these don't call deprecated methods (e.g. _dim) and don't map between logical sizes (i.e. nDimension == 0 -> size [0]). What you ask for is what you get.

The full 0-sized dimension support is hidden behind an ifdef, because we it's not fully supported yet.

body:
…port.

Unlike resizeLegacy / resizeNdLegacy, these don't call deprecated methods (e.g. _dim) and don't map between logical sizes (i.e. nDimension == 0 -> size [0]).  What you ask for is what you get.

The full 0-sized dimension support is hidden behind an ifdef, because we it's not fully supported yet.
